com.inrix.sdk

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.UserManager

  • public final class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages asynchronous user-related operations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UserManager.ChangePasswordOptions
      Contains options that are used in changing a password.
      static interface  UserManager.ILoginOperationResponseListener
      Response listener for user account operations.
      static class  UserManager.IsUserAvailableOptions
      Contains options that are used in checking if a user is registered.
      static class  UserManager.RegisterUserOptions
      Contains options that are used in registering a user.
      static class  UserManager.ResetPasswordOptions
      Contains options that are used in resetting a user's password.
      static class  UserManager.UserManagerException
      An exception that is thrown when there is an error with an LocationsManager operation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ICancellable changePassword(UserManager.ChangePasswordOptions options, UserManager.ILoginOperationResponseListener listener)
      Changes password for the user who is currently logged in.
      boolean isLoggedIn()
      Returns whether any user is currently logged in.
      ICancellable isUserAvailable(UserManager.IsUserAvailableOptions options, UserManager.ILoginOperationResponseListener listener)
      Returns whether the specified user is registered.
      void logOut()
      Logs out the current user and clears the saved user preferences.
      ICancellable registerUser(UserManager.RegisterUserOptions options, UserManager.ILoginOperationResponseListener listener)
      Registers a new user.
      ICancellable resetPassword(UserManager.ResetPasswordOptions options, UserManager.ILoginOperationResponseListener listener)
      Resets the password for an existing user.

    • Method Detail

      • logOut

        public final void logOut()
        Logs out the current user and clears the saved user preferences.

      • isLoggedIn

        public final boolean isLoggedIn()
        Returns whether any user is currently logged in.
        Returns:
        true, if logged in; otherwise false.

      • isUserAvailable

        public final ICancellable isUserAvailable(UserManager.IsUserAvailableOptions options,
                           UserManager.ILoginOperationResponseListener listener)
        Returns whether the specified user is registered.
        Parameters:
        options - Contains information on the user.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        UserManager.UserManagerException - when either options or listener is null.

      • registerUser

        public final ICancellable registerUser(UserManager.RegisterUserOptions options,
                        UserManager.ILoginOperationResponseListener listener)
        Registers a new user.
        Parameters:
        options - Contains information on the user to register.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        UserManager.UserManagerException - when either options or listener is null, or when the user is already logged in.

      • resetPassword

        public final ICancellable resetPassword(UserManager.ResetPasswordOptions options,
                         UserManager.ILoginOperationResponseListener listener)
        Resets the password for an existing user.
        Parameters:
        options - Contains information needed for resetting a password.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        UserManager.UserManagerException - when either options or listener is null.

      • changePassword

        public final ICancellable changePassword(UserManager.ChangePasswordOptions options,
                          UserManager.ILoginOperationResponseListener listener)
        Changes password for the user who is currently logged in.
        Parameters:
        options - Contains information on the old and new password.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        UserManager.UserManagerException - when either options or listener is null, or when the user is not logged in.
